website_summaries.verdict: Good value in a set that contains 6 different chisels and carrying case. Handles are comfortable to use.
pros: Offers chrome vanadium steel alloy blades that should last a long time
Works well for basic jobs around the house
6 chisels, honing guide, and sharpening stone – a complete kit at a great price
cons: Chisels won't stand up well to heavy-duty use
May need sharpening out of the box

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to spend time polishing and sharpening
customer_reviews.text: The quality is actually pretty good. However, these chisels need a significant amount of work before I would call them acceptable to use. Out of the box, they were not polished, not sharp, lots of nicks in the edges, and edges that are not square to the blade/neck. With a significant amount of work, you can tune these up — I bought the set that came with the whet stone and guide. I was able to put a decent edge on these tools but it took be about 2 hours to get through all 8 chisels. A photo is attached of the before and after on one of the edges.
customer_reviews.author: BCR

customer_reviews.title: Great value!  Nice set of chisels.
customer_reviews.text: Good set of chisels. Been using them on various woodworking projects for the last couple months. I've used may types and brands of chisels over the years and these do just as well as the more expensive ones I've used. Pros: Honing guide is nice and helpful - use a better stone though Like the handles - comfortable and easy to keep a good grip Great value - think I paid around $40 for them Cons: Don't like the stone - kind of cheap The case isn't great - hard to get the chisels in and out quick and easy Overall, for the value, I really like this set. Minor gripes on the incidentals, but the chisels work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill B

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Chisel set is a good general use wood chisel kit. I had couple of issues, the sharping guide. There is a small amount of information dealing with the guide 's use and at first I thought it was the wrong guide for this set of chisels. I went to the VonHaus web site and found the correct set up for the guide. It seems this is a general type guide used on many different blades mostly for hand planner blades. The chisels need sharpened before use they have a" grinder" type finish from the OEM. At the end of the day the set is a good deal for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Claw

customer_reviews.title: No quality control, buy something else
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time and was packed well. The plastic case is very nice and the chisels have great handles. Sounds good right, except quality control should have never let this go. Some chisels had heavy machine marks, that I could have dealt with but one had a half moon gouge almost 1/16” in it. This was my first set of nicer chisels and I do not want to have to grind this out so back they go. I had responded to an email from the mfr about this. Their response, contact Amazon, so back they go. Amazon makes the return process easy so my recommendation would be to buy someone else’s product, I will be.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S Valvero

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The 3/8 in chisel in the set we received should have never passed quality control. Unfortunately, this set was a gift for our son and we did not inspect every chisel before hand delivering the set to him in Romania. He found the bad chisel in a matter of minutes. If you order this set, I highly recommend that you closely inspect every chisel in the set immediately .
customer_reviews.author: LGreen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy. If you're on the fence about these, hop off the fence and pull the trigger, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Especially good for a beginner/novice woodworker who may not have accumulated the extras like the sharpening stone and the bevel gauge (can't remember exactly what it's called). The chisels felt to be very good quality and were VERY sharp. Actually, I have a cut on my thumb that shows exactly how sharp. I found something to use the chisels on as soon as I opened the box, definitely a must-have tool for anyone who does any kind of work with wood and this is a GREAT value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stone warped
customer_reviews.text: Chisels were not sharpened. They still had tool marks on them. The sharpening stone was no help because it was warped. I had to invest many hours and $20 is sand paper to flatten the stone so I could use it. I should have invested the money in a nicer set. I would not recommend this set to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Collins

customer_reviews.title: Made in CHINA, and it shows!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. As soon as I pulled out the box and saw the Made in China sticker, I began to worry. And, sure enough, my assumptions were correct. Starting with the box, complete junk, would never last, even if you were super careful. Then, the product.... Subpar finishing on every edge. Not sharp, not true, complete waste of time. Not sure how anyone could give this a positive review. Returning and going back to a trusted name.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Knepper

customer_reviews.title: the cardboard shipping box was in perfect condition therefore quality control is a problem
customer_reviews.text: The box is junk. I'll have to glue it together, it was split apart in the shipping box......the cardboard shipping box was in perfect condition therefore quality control is a problem. The chisels are discolored and the chrome is worn off on the backs of the chisels......like they have been used before. Not very pleased. In a bind for time so I'll keep them.........
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed and totally unusable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I have been a woodworker for over forty years and a high school wood shop teacher. These chisels are the absolutely worst chisels that I have ever seen. They are not square, they are not even close to sharp and each one has a very severe burr. Rather than spend many hours on my wet stone sharpener I will be returning this Made in China mess to Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Good tools, need sharpening
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these chisels for the convenience of the multiple sizes. The price point is very good. The honing guide works very well and the sharpening stone works good to start with and you'll need that coarse side. This brings me to the warning, these don't arrive sharp from the factory. Not only dull, but grooved. I used the coarse side of the stone more than 200 strokes per chisel to get the grooves out. I then finished them with a diamond stone and a fine Japanese water stone. They now cut printer paper like a razor blade. plenty sharp for a chisel. The box they come in is nice.
customer_reviews.author: wishinIwasfishin

customer_reviews.title: Happy enough for the money spent.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this set of chisels a five star review more because I see good potential in them once I sharpen to my liking, which is Scary Sharp. That being said. Out of the box they quite badly need sharpening and honing. The 1 -1/4" has a small nick on a corner (see picture). The 1-1/2" has a rather jagged cutting edge also but not a big deal as I sharpen to my specs anyway.those two chisels will be a bit more work than I was hoping. The steel seems very nice and the handles also seem at least adequate. I have large hands
customer_reviews.author: billV

customer_reviews.title: Why are there burrs on the edge?
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice and the chisels seem nice and beefy. I just don't understand why they all still have burrs on the edge. As a knife maker, I know, you sharpen to a razors edge by establishing a burr, then you refine the burr and strope it off. There is a file guide and stone, but shouldn't chisels come razor sharp? I've never bought anything that had a sharp edge come with a burr....I'm BAFFLED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Erving

customer_reviews.title: Not usable out of the box
customer_reviews.text: As some other reviewers have stated, the edges are not sharpened and polished. The edges have nicks in them and are not square. They are not usable without a significant amount of work to regrind the edges.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Q

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Ill be sending these back. I get they are "starter" chisels but the bevels are litterally like 10-15 degrees off! They look horrible and it would take hours upon hours sanding the machined surfaces to a mirror finish
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Moncrief

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: thee are acceptable for the money. Even if you buy the more expensive stuff, you still have to sharpen them out of the box. So you can just sharpen these. No major defects, but they were not sharp. Had burrs, tooling marks. But worked well once sharpened and loved to have a good variety including the 2" one. thought that I will return it if not satisfied, but I'm keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Secerator

customer_reviews.title: Decent chisels for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Chisels work great with a little sharpening. Backs are flat and edge holds for multiple projects. Handles hold up well even after much mallet abuse. Not a fan of the stone that comes with it. Buy a good double grit whetstone and then your good to go.
customer_reviews.author: CClark487

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was eager to try these out. The quality is great. They're easy to sharpen and they are extremely durable. Definitely built to last. If I had to say something negative it would simply be that they are a little cumbersome but even that makes little to no difference. I was able to both broad work and detailed. Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Anders J Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Not as described on website. Nearly all chisels were without protective guards and sharpening stone was cracked in half. The chisels were in good shape and appeared not to have been used. While I had to replace the sharpening stones, the product was still a good buy and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joan A Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Good quality chisels, especically for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality chisels, especically for the price. The honing guide and sharping stone alone are worth the price. Plenty sharp enough out of the box. Really no need to sharpen or flatten them, ready to use. The box they come in is suitable storage. Haven't had them long enough to determine how long they hold an edge. I think they are slightly better than my hardware store brand. However, there is a Japanese set of chisels that cost somewhere between $2,000 to $4,000. Unfortunately, I am unable to do a comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Good set of chisels
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a set of good chisels and mistakenly felt there probably wasn't much difference between a cheap set and more expensive ones . I should have bought these a long time ago. I probably would have had better results ,less frustration and more skin. The jig and Stone will help keep these sharp and precise.
customer_reviews.author: TIM J.

customer_reviews.title: A great set of chisels for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this set of chisels to be a great value. I am very well pleased with the set and how well the chisels work. I was a little hesitant at first to order them because I thought that a set of this quality would be a lot more expensive. I was well pleased when I received them. I think they work well and the case is very sturdy also. I would recommend this set to anyone who wants a good of chisels at a reasonable price. They are probably not a good enough quality for a contractor or fine woodworker but for me who only uses them occasionally I think they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Laque

customer_reviews.title: An unfortunate purchase
customer_reviews.text: Like many others, the great reviews had me optimistic. Unfortunately, after one quick use on a softer piece of wood, the end of my 2" ended up with a nice size chip in it. Not a huge deal, considering I can just re-do the edge. However, I then go to use the honing guide and realize that the bevel for the tool to rest in wasn't even level. Seems I either just had bad luck and got a less than quality set, or the set itself is less than decent quality. Disappointing when I can even use the honing guide to help sharpen the dull/unlevel out-of-the-box chisels....
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Aaron Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: nice box
customer_reviews.text: guide is junk tossed it . the stone will work for the lawnmower. the chisels look nice good handle grip. the blades all have chips and Knicks in them I'm sure they will be alright after a serious grinding. the box is nice
customer_reviews.author: stuff

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, excellent price, good quality, sharp but not quite enough, you will need to do some additional sharpening. Spend a little time with some various grit wet stones and you won't be sorry. Keep in mind these are not a $200 or $300 set of chisel but will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, nice chisels
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, nice chisels. Not full tang, honing guide and stone alone is worth the price. Chisels have a nice protective end cap on each one which is nice because I keep 3 of them in a tool belt.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Chisels
customer_reviews.text: The chisels were a gift for my son. They came in a sturdy wooden case and were well made and seem like they could get the job done. They are heavy and well made. The sharpening stone is an added bonus and fits well in the case. My son was pleased with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: A premium set - not entry level
customer_reviews.text: The way that this set came packaged was very impressive. This is definitely not an entry level set of Woodworking Wood Chisel. I did enjoy the fact that this set came in a very nice Chisel sharpener & a durable wooden case. This set will provide years of service for my woodshop projects around the house.
customer_reviews.author: System Admin

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Christmas. When I got it in the mail it was packaged very nicely so as not to damage it at all. Upon opening the tool set they all look very sturdy and well-made. I am very excited to give these to my dad for Christmas. And I had a couple wood-workers take a look at it for their opinion and they all said it looked amazing and for the price it was a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Just made sense.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sharpening jig to hold my chisels and almost bought one and also almost bought a couple of sharpening stones when I spotted this. It was cheaper than the separate items and even included the chisels. I couldn't see passing this set up.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of wood chisels
customer_reviews.text: Left my Stanley wood chisels behind in my old house and got these for a small project modifying a wood bed frame. These are much nicer and come in a nice case with sharpening stone and sharpening and care instructions. The chisels are sharp, seem sturdy and worked great. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: sk330

customer_reviews.title: Unfinished quality control.
customer_reviews.text: The casting of the sharpener wheel does not fit the chisels, so I couldn't use it and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit disappointed in the finish of this set. The grind was so deep it affected the edge on all the chisels. Definitely not worth my time and energy to fix what should have been done the right way from the start.
customer_reviews.author: Palmerino C.

customer_reviews.title: Good chisle set
customer_reviews.text: The set over all is rather nice. My only real gripe is that the stone is not flat but is wavy and inconsistant so I will need to do a lot of surface work to make it useable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Set
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a quality set. They came with an edge but I'm working no sharpening them up really good so they have a razor sharp edge. Case is hard plastic and seems like it will be durable and the sharpening stone and blade angle holder seem good quality as well. Overall I am very pleased with the set.
customer_reviews.author: mpn1241

customer_reviews.title: gets the job with style baby - I like to work with tools that look smooth
customer_reviews.text: SIMPLE- without the bull : The design of these tools are: 1. light 2. strong. 3. hand held friendly. 4. version appealing (oh, the box is also cool) 5. gets the job with style baby - I like to work with tools that look smooth :-)
customer_reviews.author: abran paso

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Case a little cheap, but that has nothing to do with the chisels. They worked fine for me. Nice price also. For those that want top-of-the-liner chisels, try PFEIL chisels, also sold by Amazon. Had to go to a well-known, on-line video place to see how to use the honing guide. Suggest everyone who purchases chisels from Amazon do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Diver

customer_reviews.title: OK as Chisels, but They are Only Rough Ground
customer_reviews.text: These chisels come with only a rough grind. The backs are concave, and require a fair amount of work to get them flat and smooth. The beveled front require quick a bit of work to get smooth enough to be sharp.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Densford III

customer_reviews.title: Rust rust rust
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed. After going back and forth between this set and the amazon brand, i decided the wood case and extra chisels were worth it. These had great reviews and it is my first chisel set. When the package arrived, i opened it up to inspect / check them out. Unfortunately all of the chisels have rust. I messaged the seller and hope they make this right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: New to woodworking but I seem to get good production out of these. Stone has a slight hump in it but didn't seem to make a difference. Rolling tool works but the jaws are not quite straight.
customer_reviews.author: Macoon

customer_reviews.title: I like it so far
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. Out of the box, they have a decent edge but should be honed. Handles have a nice feel, the rubber is soft, so there isn't any slip. I like the wider chisels (1" and UP), they are hard to find. Well see how they hold up,but for the price it's a very good set.
customer_reviews.author: Joel L.  Vallone

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my son for his birthday, and it was EXACTLY what he wanted! He has discovered his love of wood-working, and this set is both quality and precision for what he does. Excellent chisels in a very nice presentation---the wood box is very nice. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Great Chisels for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great chisels for the price. I touched up the edge when I bought them and have done multiple mortise and tenon joints (around 20-26) with minimal resharpening. I am very particular about the edge on my tools so someone else may not have sharpened them at all. The stone isn't great so plan on buying something else to keep them sharp.
customer_reviews.author: mcelrepr

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am glad they ce with the honing stone because they needed to be honest before use. After sharpening they seam to hold their edge well. All in all, good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus C Baker

customer_reviews.title: Needs sharpening, but holds up well
customer_reviews.text: When I received these I had a couple nicks in the end like others did. The ends were also not that sharp, but ok. I spent a couple hours using a whetstone and they came out crazy sharp! They've worked awesome so far. I'm not very good at sharpening, so I used the included honing guide, which worked very well. I did not use the oilstone because I have some whet stones.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: meets the declared characteristics
customer_reviews.text: corresponds to the declared characteristics. but you need to align the blades yourself and sharpen the tool. For this, it is better to buy separately high-quality sharpening bars.
customer_reviews.author: ILyub

customer_reviews.title: The only thing square is the box they came in
customer_reviews.text: Oh man. Reviews warmed of the poor craftsmanship or lack there of...nice presentation and packaging. Chisels feel well made, sharp. But they are not even close to being square. You will spend some time on the sanding stones getting these right but I'm sure it will be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee sut

customer_reviews.title: Good starter chisel set
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a good starter chisel set. Was able to use them directly out of the case but they definitely are not as sharp as they need to be. Will update review after I sharpen them and see how well they hold an edge.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Deforest

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite set of chisels
customer_reviews.text: Exquisite set of chisels. Box is garbage, but you're (hopefully) not buying the box. These are sharp, strong, and easy to control. Unless you want to drop over $100 on a set of chisels, snap these up as they're arguably the best set of chisels for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Yorke

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t expect this quality for the price I paid. This is honestly much nicer than the starter’s kit I was looking for and I am definitely not complaining!
customer_reviews.author: vasiliki gianakos

customer_reviews.title: Was very satisfied with the prompt service and of course with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Was very satisfied with the prompt service and of course with the Product will use them again and will recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul T. Lex

customer_reviews.title: Needs sharpening but well made.
customer_reviews.text: Like other people have mentioned, the out of the box sharpness is a joke. You will need to spend a couple of hours sharpening these, but once sharp they do keep an edge and seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: paratwa

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: they keep a good edge. I'm pretty surprised with how well they work. They're long and seem pretty sturdy. Only used once but happy with them thus far.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: My aunt loves this.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my aunt this Christmas. She’s very good with crafts and knows how to use tools like a master worker, having been raised on a farm. She told me that these are great tools.
customer_reviews.author: Roger K. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Look good to me.
customer_reviews.text: I just took delivery on this chisel set. It arrived super fast. The tools look to be of very high quality. I could see no flaws. I tested 3 of the chisels without sharpening them further, and was impressed. In all fairness , rating them fairly can only be done after use, but, they appear to be good quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: hemi 1304

customer_reviews.title: Totally recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chisels!! Fast shipping too!! Chisels came already with awesome sharp edges, ready to go. And the stone came handy to sharp another tools like my hand plane. The case is very useful so you don't worry about getting other tools to damage them!
customer_reviews.author: rob.dual21

customer_reviews.title: If you’re serious about notching, invest elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Day 1, first project using these and 1 out of the 4 broke nearly immediately with little pressure. Was still able to complete the project with the remainder of the chisels. Good value, but if your serious about learning to wood notch, I wish I invested my money towards something that would last. Pretty disappointed one broke so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Very meh!
customer_reviews.text: Would be wonderful chisels if the company practiced better quality control. First set came with damage to the cutting edge of more than half of the chisels and a box that wouldn't latch closed. Second set came with slightly less damaged cutting edges and a box that closes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of chisels for the money. The kit comes with sharpening devices to help with sharpening. Nice case and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Warped sharpening stones
customer_reviews.text: The chisels are great and the box it comes in very nice but I reordered and the 2nd one was more warped than the first one. They did take care of me. So I am very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Vanderploeg

customer_reviews.title: A good "starter set "
customer_reviews.text: Spend a little time leveling the backs and sharing and you will have a good starter set of chisels. I'd recommend a 3000/8000 for sharpening. The stone that comes with is barely fine enough for leveling.
customer_reviews.author: Revan

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Serious chisel Set for average money. The chisels are very sharp and cut hardwoods very well. The sharpening tool and jig is what is needed to keep these tools in good shape for a long time. The wooden box is a little flimsy, but does not take form the tools at all. A wooded mallet really helps and is needed to complete the package. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: RGA

customer_reviews.title: Lots of work to first sharpening
customer_reviews.text: The basic material is fine. My issue comes from the relatively rough machining. Each chisel requires about 20 minutes to flatten/polish the back, and then 10 minutes for the beveled front. Once there they seem to be just fine. I expect that subsequent sharpenings will be as quick as with any chisel. Handles are all plastic and can stand up to hammering with softer hammers (wood, plastic), but probably not metal hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi bambino

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and ready to go
customer_reviews.text: chisels arrived sharp as a razor. No nicks in the blades. Heavy duty handles nice case sharpening stone has dual surfaces excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Solid and very useful.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of chisels. I wanted traditional wooden handle chisels but felt these might be more durable. I'm surprised how often I use them from sculpting / shaping to cleaning up damaged wood for repairs to cutting for door hardware. They're fun!
customer_reviews.author: James Kopf

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought they would be
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. Exceeded expectations. Purchased a dewalt set a few months ago and they did not hold an edge after the first use. Carved a 5 foot mantle with these on hard oak and not one of them lost their edge. Very impressed with the way these are holding up.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisZ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a replacement set for our furniture making shop. I am so pleased with the balance of them as well as the grip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The chisels look great! I'm in the middle of putting together my ...
customer_reviews.text: The chisels look great! I'm in the middle of putting together my shop/garage. So I won't be using them probably for another week. That said though they feel solidly built and nice in the hand. I will update this review as soon as I get a chance to use them. The seller was great and very fast. I would definitely buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Haven't tried them out but will update if something goes wrong, if no update assume they are quality and working well
customer_reviews.author: Jame

customer_reviews.title: Its going to be work but its worth it
customer_reviews.text: They fit my hands and i have huge hands they look awesome...but they arent flat or sharp...which i was prepared for...but one has a chip on the corner and another has a grind mark on the bevel that is super deep and i have been sharpening it slowly to get it out...but i am always willing to put in extra work to make a tool perfect...this also makes it more appreciated
customer_reviews.author: Cook Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Great Chisel Set for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Great, strong, full tang chisels that you just can’t beat for the price. I got this 10 piece chisel set for less than some 4 or 6 piece sets. This is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Emory C. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Product description matches what you get, which is why I give it 5 stars. The chisels are ground flat and the steel is holding up well. I will be purchasing finer stones to obtain a sharper edge then the included stone can provide. A bit of oil on the honing guide helped to smooth its operation.
customer_reviews.author: Beerwhisper

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Comes in a nice hard shell case. You can feel the sturdiness if the chisels when you hold them. Chisels came with plastic guards and well sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Chisel Set
customer_reviews.text: Extremely satisfied with these chisels they are of good quality and are packaged very well in their case .
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The chisels come very sharp. They just need to be tuned up, take the nicks out and polish them. They seem to be very durable and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: mike l

customer_reviews.title: Chisels hold the edge well
customer_reviews.text: Chisels are extremely sharp made light work of the project I’m working on. The downside is.....the storage box is cheap/ flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Q.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Set of Chisels
customer_reviews.text: Set arrived sharp right out of the box. Easy to handle and they can take a good whack from a mallet, too! Good investment at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: RonS

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son and he really likes that it is a set. Well made
customer_reviews.author: JULIE BENNY

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a woodworker my entire life. My father started teaching me when I was 5 years old. Now I’m nearly 60 and I’ve used just about every type of hand tool and machine for woodworking. These chisels I would say are inferior to any I ever worked with.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Looked like a great value, came damaged in box.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive my first real Chisel set. When I opened the box, they seemed packaged and protected. upon inspecting the blades, almost all of them were damaged on the tips which is surprising as they are all covered with a protective tips.. It does come with the sharpening stone, just didn't think I was going to have to use the stone first before I actually use the chisel..
customer_reviews.author: doug stacy

customer_reviews.title: go quality
customer_reviews.text: these are very good steel and quality for the price. Needed some chisels to finish trim around the house and was not looking for long term keepers. These surprised me in their quality and steel. Not the best on the market but very good for the price. Would recommend for a starter.
customer_reviews.author: Qatarfloyd

customer_reviews.title: Chisel Set
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in two days, ahead of schedule! I bought it as a gift so I can't speak to the chisels performance. The case, chisels, and honing guide appear sturdy and have a good weight, not cheap or flimsy. I'm satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: A Gift for My Husband
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set as a gift for my husband. He is very difficult to please and almost impossible to select a good gift. he was thrilled with the chisel set. It was a big hit and I am happy that I made the selection I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good chisels, bad stone and jig
customer_reviews.text: Will require a lot of sharpening. The stone came cracked and the jig can't properly hold my chisels. However, chisels were much cheaper than other brands. I purchased a separate sharpening stone and jig and was able to sharpen them after several hours.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chisels
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. As others have mentioned, they're getting 4 stars instead of 5 because I had to work on sharpening them for about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Nom De Plume

customer_reviews.title: Price was right.... (ish)
customer_reviews.text: They look great. Just dont look very close. They are dull as a garden hoe. This is probably why they sell them with a stone and angle guide.
customer_reviews.author: M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: very beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: It was a present. the person was very happy about it and said it was a good quality set.
customer_reviews.author: LABM

customer_reviews.title: Super Value
customer_reviews.text: what a value, sharpened them to remve the grind marks. (they are not that sharp out of the box) . but they sharpened quickly. like the heft of the chisels. Also recommend purchase of 3M Trizact , it is just great for honing a sharp chisel or knife
customer_reviews.author: cliff

customer_reviews.title: Good not great
customer_reviews.text: These are really great chisels. You will need to spend a lot of time sharpening them and the stone isn’t with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert gaynor

customer_reviews.title: These wood chisels are not as sharp as they claim ...
customer_reviews.text: These wood chisels are not as sharp as they claim they have brought him and it cuts harder it's not smooth cutting or shaving or chiseling whatever you want to call it so they're okay that's why I bought honing Stone to sharpen them okay.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Y.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well secured in the case with easy access to each tool and the honing device.
customer_reviews.author: iris rodak

customer_reviews.title: sharping stone and glide a nice assortment of chisel sizes
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal set for those times you need a chisel for those special jobs around the house. Well made, sharping stone and glide a nice assortment of chisel sizes. It’s comes in a nice case to keep it all toghther.
customer_reviews.author: John F Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my amateur wood working
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding chisel set for the price. Perfect for my amateur wood working. Easy to sharpen and maintain condition.
customer_reviews.author: Oydoy79

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Needs fine tune sharpening on arrival. Easy to do with kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans up rough cuts perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: No sharpening needed. Able to use straight out of box.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rosemond

customer_reviews.title: They are worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The chisels are of good quality, they have a nice weight, handles are comfy overall good product. The quality of work they can do is only limited by the user.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Gorokhovsky

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not terribly sharp. I expect wood chisels to come from the factory “scary sharp”. These not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Took these for a “test drive “ this weekend building a drawer. Everything I need for my skill level
customer_reviews.author: Papa Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. Nice quality. Good case.
customer_reviews.text: Great set. Build solid. The stone will need to be flattened but it sharpens nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Butler

customer_reviews.title: opened the box and it looks very good. I haven't tried it yet
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday, opened the box and it looks very good. I haven't tried it yet, but looks very promising. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Attila Kun

product_meta.title: VonHaus 8 pc Craftsman Woodworking Wood Chisel Set for Carving with Honing Guide, Sharpening Stone and Storage Case
feature_bullets: SET INCLUDES: 6x chisels 1/4", 1/2", 3/4", 1", 1-1/4", 1-1/2" (6mm, 13mm, 19mm, 25mm, 32mm, 38mm) 1x honing guide & 1x sharpening stone (120/200 grit)
HEAT TREATED: Heat-treated, chrome vanadium steel alloy blades with narrow side bevels
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: Ergonomically designed handles for improved comfort and control
STORAGE CASE: Supplied in a blow molded plastic storage case
DOMESTIC and PROFESSIONAL USE: Suitable for home woodworking and professional craftsman

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,458 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
